settings.title: The Rare Company has a proven track record of auctioning, brokering, and selling valuable MTG rarities.
settings.text:
Services we offer:

  • Years of consignment management experience
  • Cash advances
  • 24/7 client support
  • Free appraisals for your collection

We accept the following items in our consignment program:

  • Mainstream published MTG cards (1993-Present)
  • MTG sealed products (1993-Present)
  • MTG and non-Magic original artwork, sketches, prints, and giclees
  • Artist proofs, altered cards, and pimp cards
  • Misprints, oddities, miscuts, and test print cards
  • MTG memorabilia, artifacts, and uncut sheets

We do not accept non-MTG collectibles or stolen merchandise.
